aboutUsSubtitle: Planner.so is your ultimate travel companion, helping you plan and organize your journeys with ease.
components.error.description: We apologize for the inconvenience. We are working hard to get you back on course.
components.error.subtitle: We are experiencing some turbulence on our end. Our team of expert digital pilots is working to get you back on course.
components.error.title: Oops! Your journey flight has been delayed
faq1Subtitle: Planner.so is your ultimate travel companion, designed to simplify your travel planning. It offers an intuitive platform where you can effortlessly create, organize, and visualize all your trips in one convenient place.
faq2Subtitle: Your first journey is completely free! Enjoy full access to every feature, allowing you to explore the full potential of Planner.so at no cost.
faq2Title: How does the first free trip work?
faq3Subtitle: We accept all major credit cards, securely processed through Stripe to ensure your transactions are safe and hassle-free.
faq4Subtitle: Absolutely! You can update and adjust your itinerary anytime using our flexible and easy-to-use platform.
faq4Title: Can I modify my itinerary after planning?
homepageSubtitle: Create an account and start planning your dream trip now
homepageTitle: Take the Stress Out of Travel Simplify your Journey
journeyBegins: {count, plural, one {day to go} other {days to go}}
mainFeatureExpensesDescription: Stay on top of your budget with a clear overview of your expenses, broken down by day and category for easy management.
mainFeatureJourneyDescription: Start your adventure by creating a personalized journey, tailored to your destination, dates, and budget.
mainFeaturePlanningDescription: Effortlessly add and manage your daily events and expenses, categorized for clear organization and tracking.

privacyPolicy.subtitle: At Planner.so, we are dedicated to safeguarding your privacy. This policy explains the information we collect, how we use it, and your rights regarding that information.
privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicyPage.title: Planner.so | Privacy Policy
privacyPolicySection2.description.item1: information about your usage of our website and services. This includes details such as your IP address, browser type, device information, and operating system.
privacyPolicySection2.description.item2: information you provide to us when you register on our website.
privacyPolicySection2.title: Information We Collect
privacyPolicySection3.description: Your information is used to deliver and enhance our services, personalize your experience, and communicate with you effectively.
privacyPolicySection3.title: How We Use Your Information
privacyPolicySection4.description.item1: Request access to the information we hold about you
privacyPolicySection4.description.item2: Request correction or deletion of your personal data
privacyPolicySection4.description.item3: Object to the processing of your data
privacyPolicySection4.description.item4: Restrict how we use your data
privacyPolicySection4.description.item5: Request a copy of your data in a structured format
privacyPolicySection4.description.last: If you have any questions or concerns regarding your privacy, please reach out to us at {email}.
privacyPolicySection4.title: Your Rights

termsOfServicePage.section1.description: By using Planner.so you confirm your acceptance of, and agree to be bound by, these terms and conditions.
termsOfServicePage.section1.title: 1. Introduction
termsOfServicePage.section10.description: The content, organization, graphics, design, and other matters related to Planner.so are protected under applicable copyrights and other proprietary laws. Copying, redistribution, use or publication of any such matters or any part of Planner.so is prohibited.
termsOfServicePage.section10.title: 10. Intellectual Property
termsOfServicePage.section11.description: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any significant changes.
termsOfServicePage.section11.title: 11. Changes to Terms
termsOfServicePage.section12.description: This Agreement is governed by the laws of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland. You acknowledge that no joint venture, partnership, employment, or agency relationship exists between you and Planner.so as a result of your use of these services. You agree not to hold yourself out as a representative, agent or employee of Planner.so. You agree that Planner.so will not be liable by reason of any representation, act or omission to act by you.
termsOfServicePage.section12.title: 12. General Terms and Law
termsOfServicePage.section2.description: This Agreement takes effect on the date on which you first use the Planner.so application.
termsOfServicePage.section2.title: 2. Agreement to Terms and Conditions
termsOfServicePage.section3.description: We provide a platform for tracking startup launches, as well as a list of resources such starutps can be launched on. Users can: a) Purchase a copy of our directories list without creating an account b) Purchase full access to the list, which includes updates and the ability to track submission processes.
termsOfServicePage.section3.title: 3. Services
termsOfServicePage.section4.description: Due to the nature of digital products, the Planner.so cannot be refunded or exchanged once access is granted.
termsOfServicePage.section4.title: 4. Refunds
termsOfServicePage.section5.description: Our services are subject to fair use. We reserve the right to limit or terminate access for users who abuse our services or use them in a way that negatively impacts other users.
termsOfServicePage.section5.title: 5. Fair Use Policy
termsOfServicePage.section6.description: It is not warranted that Planner.so will meet your requirements or that its operation will be uninterrupted or error free. All express and implied warranties or conditions not stated in this Agreement (including without limitation, loss of profits, loss or corruption of data, business interruption or loss of contracts), so far as such exclusion or disclaimer is permitted under the applicable law are excluded and expressly disclaimed. This Agreement does not affect your statutory rights.
termsOfServicePage.section6.title: 6. Disclaimer
termsOfServicePage.section7.description: Planner.so does not give any warranty, guarantee or other term as to the quality, fitness for purpose or otherwise of the software. Planner.so shall not be liable to you by reason of any representation (unless fraudulent), or any implied warranty, condition or other term, or any duty at common law, for any loss of profit or any indirect, special or consequential loss, damage, costs, expenses or other claims (whether caused by Planner.so's negligence or the negligence of its servants or agents or otherwise) which arise out of or in connection with the provision of any goods or services by Planner.so. Planner.so shall not be liable or deemed to be in breach of contract by reason of any delay in performing, or failure to perform, any of its obligations if the delay or failure was due to any cause beyond its reasonable control. Notwithstanding contrary clauses in this Agreement, in the event that Planner.so are deemed liable to you for breach of this Agreement, you agree that Planner.so's liability is limited to the amount actually paid by you for your services or software, which amount calculated in reliance upon this clause. You hereby release Planner.so from any and all obligations, liabilities and claims in excess of this limitation.
termsOfServicePage.section7.title: 7. Warranties and Limitation of Liability
termsOfServicePage.section8.description: Planner.so is not responsible for what the user does with the user-generated content.
termsOfServicePage.section8.title: 8. Responsibilities
termsOfServicePage.section9.description: As we continue to improve Planner.so and expand our offerings, the price may increase. The discount is provided to help customers secure the current price without being surprised by future increases.
termsOfServicePage.section9.title: 9. Price Adjustments
termsOfServicePage.subtitle: By using our service, you agree to these Terms of Service ('Terms'). Please read them carefully.
